import React, { useState } from "react"; import './form.css'; function Form() { const [cardName, setName] = useState(""); const [number, setNumber] = useState(""); const [month, setMonth] = useState(""); const [year, setYear] = useState(""); const [cvc, setCvc] = useState(""); return (
setName(e.target.value)} />
setNumber(e.target.value)} />
setMonth(e.target.value)} />
setYear(e.target.value)} />
setCvc(e.target.value)} />
); } export default Form;
